description: Conservation Area consent in connection with proposed demolition of existing 3 storey building and erection of 7 storey building comprising ground floor (Use classes A1/A2/A3/D1), first second, third, fourth and fifth floors (B1 offices) and sixth floor (Use classes A3/A4/B1) and associated works Also full planning submitted reference P072713 This proposal may have an affect on the character and appearance of the Conservation Area Section 73 of Planning (Listed Building and Conservation Areas) Act 1990 Para 8 (2) (d) and (Regulation 5A of the Planning and Listed Buildings and Conservation Areas) Regulations 1990 (SI 1990/1519) as inserted by the Planning  (Listed Buildings and Conservation Areas) (Amendment) (England) Regulations 2004 (SI 2004/2210).
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: No demolition shall take place until a contract for the associated development provided for in planning permission (ref: P072713) has been made. 

 REASON: To prevent premature demolition in a Conservation Area.
